features.title: Upvote button
features.description: We turn upvotes into a token transfer. In-app purchase of LTL branded tokens with Apple Pay.

features.title: Plant Trees
features.description: Each upvote earns you LTL Tokens. These tokens are used to donate to #onetreeplanted.org

features.title: Unique content
features.description: Add unique places and earn tokens with every booking driven from your unique content.

appSlider.title: Capture the spirit, the very essence of the destination.
appSlider.description: Ambassadors let you explore the exceptional places they love most, and if their content gets featured they receive LTL tokens.

features.title: Capture the Spirit
features.description: What if photos aren’t doing a good job at reflecting the vibe?

features.title: Upload a Photo
features.description: If you`ve found something unique or your trip was so unforgettable, capture it and share it.

features.title: Unforgettable places
features.description: Change the user experience by surfacing content on your timeline, based on your location, friends and tag-based filters.

items.title: App Development
items.description: Notes: There’s really nothing better than receiving a tip from someone who knows their way around.

items.title: 10 Times Award
items.description: Intuitive story-telling app that captures and tags your best moments and travel stories.

items.title: Cloud Storage
items.description: A living travel journal for your friends back home. View photos by where they happened, not when.

items.title: Customization
items.description: Publish your trip photos in one place. Download them all when you get home. Or create Instagram Stories.

items.title: UX Planning
items.description: Even the people who follow me and that I follow back will  not see the place I added. It’s private and locked.

items.title: Customer Support
items.description: Receive a push notification to try that place when you are nearby. Great when you add places to visit soon ...

designAndBuilt.title: Designed & Built by the latest code integration
designAndBuilt.description: You will receive a warm welcome and you can buy more tokens with Apple Pay. The first travel app that allows in-app purchase of tokens, approved by App Store.
